global_caption: a scene featuring a grandfather wearing a black hat, a white shirt, a gray cardigan, black suit pants, and formal shoes, who is white-haired and looking at his granddaughter with a smile on his face; a mother wearing a short-sleeved long one-piece dress and white slippers, holding a basket full of groceries; a father with brown curly hair wearing a blue collar t-shirt, beige short pants, and black slippers, holding a package of plastic water bottles in one hand and the basket with the mother in the other hand; a daughter wearing a hot pink sleeveless t-shirt, a white skirt, and pink shoes, holding a yellow balloon with one hand and a teddy bear with the other hand; green trees; and a black SUV car.
region_captions: a grandfather wearing a black hat, a white shirt, a gray cardigan, black suit pants, and formal shoes. He is white-haired and is looking at his granddaughter with a smile on his face.
